title: 服务器启动后自动关闭，求救
author: V无梦
txt_content:
不知道为什么我的服务器突然就启动后自动关闭了，我搞了半天没弄好，希望论坛的大佬能帮我看看原因。十分感谢！



crash-2020-07-28_04.18.29-server.txt
(41.01 KB, 下载次数: 5)

服务器端报错.txt

2020-7-28 09:52 上传

replies.author: renyunzhong
replies.txt_content:
[04:18:29] [Server thread/ERROR]: Exception caught during firing event com.feed_the_beast.ftblib.events.universe.UniverseLoadedEvent$Pre@2d38d0a:
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/client/resources/I18n
net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoaderExceptionModCrash: Caught exception from FTB Library (ftblib)复制代码

看来是ftp lib导致的崩溃，建议更新此mod或者检查有没有冲突问题

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content: 把客户端的config文件夹覆盖到服务端试试

replies.author: DJ苦力怕
replies.txt_content: 这个是插件引发的错误，尝试移除所有插件再重启
